unnormalised: **Brand Collabs: Chasing the Chai Latte Dream on Insta!**
normalised: **Brand Collaborations: Chasing the Chai Latte Dream on Insta!**

unnormalised: Hey there, social media junkies! Ever noticed your feed exploding with brands and influencers doing the *thang* together? Yeah, brand collaborations are HOT right now, especially in India.
normalised: Hey there, social media junkies! Ever noticed your feed exploding with brands and influencers doing the thing together? Yeah, brand collaborations are hot right now, especially in India.

unnormalised: From fashion brands teaming up with Komal Pandey to fitness gurus pushing protein shakes with local gyms in Bangalore, everyone’s getting a slice of the collab pie.
normalised: From fashion brands teaming up with Komal Pandey to fitness gurus pushing protein shakes with local gyms in Bangalore, everyone is getting a slice of the collab pie.

unnormalised: Think about it: Diwali discounts promoted by lifestyle bloggers or a famous chef endorsing a secret biryani spice mix near Charminar! It's all happening, folks.
normalised: Think about it: Diwali discounts promoted by lifestyle bloggers or a famous chef endorsing a secret biryani spice mix near Charminar! It's all happening, folks.

unnormalised: Experts say these partnerships are boosting brand visibility like crazy. Especially with Onam around the corner, expect to see a flood of Kerala-themed collabs, think saris and coconut oil!
normalised: Experts say these partnerships are boosting brand visibility like crazy. Especially with Onam around the corner, expect to see a flood of Kerala-themed collaborations, think saris and coconut oil!

unnormalised: Even IIT grads are jumping into the influencer game, offering tech reviews in exchange for free gadgets. The market’s booming, estimated to reach Rs. 900 Crores by next year.
normalised: Even I I T grads are jumping into the influencer game, offering tech reviews in exchange for free gadgets. The market is booming, estimated to reach rupees nine hundred crores by next year.

unnormalised: So, keep your eyes peeled. Who knows? Maybe you'll be the next big influencer collabing with Amul! It's a brave new world of likes and brand deals out there!
normalised: So, keep your eyes peeled. Who knows? Maybe you will be the next big influencer collaborating with Amul! It's a brave new world of likes and brand deals out there!
